name: protein N6-(octanoyl)lysine:sulfur sulfurtransferase
definition: Protein N6-(octanoyl)lysine + 2 Sulfur donor + 2 S-Adenosyl-L-methionine <=> Protein N6-(lipoyl)lysine + 2 L-Methionine + 2 5'-Deoxyadenosine
comment: the reactant sulfur is not elemental sulfur, but it may be from the enzyme itself
